name: Brave Survivor
description: Brave survivor - In this heart-pounding beat em up, you take on the role of a brave survivor whose fist punches a path to freedom through hordes of enemies. Beat bad guys mercilessly, collect bonuses and destroy bosses in this incredible game! Carefully watch your movements so as not to fall off the battlefield into the abyss and avoid enemies - one hit and you will have to start all over again.. Features: Nice graphics by RealTI ,Nice soundtrack by Hejiko.
